original_text: Men from other countries came into Jerusalem. They took away all the good things from Jerusalem. They played a game for the best things. You were as bad as they were. You did not help the Israelites. Men from other countries came into Jerusalem. They took away all the good things from Jerusalem. They played a game for the best things. You were as bad as they were. You did not help the Israelites. Men from other countries came into Jerusalem. They took away all the good things from Jerusalem. They played a game for the best things. You were as bad as they were. You did not help the Israelites.
korean_text: 네가 멀리 섰던 날 곧 이방인이 그의 재물을 빼앗아 가며 외국인이 그의 성문에 들어가서 예루살렘을 얻기 위하여 제비 뽑던 날에 너도 그들 중 한 사람 같았느니라

sentences.original_text: Men from other countries came into Jerusalem.
They took away all the good things from Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예루살렘의 모든 좋은 것들을 가져갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They played a game for the best things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 최고의 것들을 두고 게임을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: You were as bad as they were.
You did not help the Israelites.
